page.title: 04HOME LIFE,LIFE STYLE
page.content: Home life very rural -main meal of day usually eaten en-famille,entertainment taken with the household -television mainly.Food tends to be prepared from raw materials not pre-prepared al- though many households own freezers in which own bulk supplies are stored. Jams,pickles,chutneys and other pres- erves are home made in many instances. Low proportion serious household acci- dents.Most households own dogs,cats or both,but there are few other pets. Life Style, generally domestic. Little emphasis on exterior social life with the exception of the 2 'locals' at Horsebridge and Chipshop, but even these are affected by the Methodist teatotal influence.
